ï»¿Our life is full of ups and downs.
It doesn't matter who you are or where you live.
There are always moments when your heart is broken, burnt or hurt...
...when you have to face failure, rejection or loss.
So how do you pick yourself up when you are down?
How do you start your healing when you are hurt?
Being connected with nature results in some amazing changes inside your head,...
...which begin to calm you and soothe your nerves.
If you rest your mind and reflect, you'll know.
One cannot escape the ups and downs of life,...
...but one can always find calm in nature.
One can always find comfort and clarity in the company of woods.
